title: New: Talos – In Time
body:
Cork’s **Talos** emerged last year with a magical duo of debut tracks; part SOHN, part Bon Iver, and almost ballad like in nature, there’s an inescapable beauty to the delicacy with which his music is crafted.

New track, _In Time_, comes ahead of an appearance at Dublin’s festival Hard Working Class Heroes on Friday, and again showcases the blossoming artistry that Talos possesses. Check it out below.
